dialog.title_update.description: Do you want to update the conversation title to match the first message content?

dialog.attachments.description: View and manage all attached files
dialog.conversation_selection.title: Select Conversations to {action}
dialog.conversation_selection.descriptio: Choose which conversations you want to export. Selected conversations will be downloaded as a JSON file.
Choose which conversations you want to import. Selected conversations will be merged with your existing conversations.
dialog.conversation_selection.table.name: Conversation Name
dialog.chat_error.description_timeout: The request did not receive a response from the server before timing out.
dialog.chat_error.description_server: The server responded with an error message. Review the details below.
dialog.empty_files.title: Empty Files Detected
dialog.empty_files.description: The following files are empty and have been removed from your attachments:
dialog.empty_files.reason_one: Empty files cannot be processed or sent to the AI model
dialog.empty_files.reason_two: These files have been automatically removed from your attachments
dialog.empty_files.reason_three: You can try uploading files with content instead
dialog.model_info.title: Model Information
dialog.model_not_available.title: Model Not Available
dialog.model_not_available.description: The requested model could not be found. Select an available model to continue.
chat.form.submit.tooltip_model_unavailab: Selected model is not available, please select another
chat.form.record.no_audio: Current model does not support audio
chat.form.attachments.tooltip_text_only: Text files and PDFs supported. Images, audio, and video require vision models.
chat.form.attachments.images_requires_vi: Images require vision models to be processed
chat.form.attachments.audio_requires_mod: Audio files require audio models to be processed
chat.form.attachments.pdf_text_warning: PDFs will be converted to text. Image-based PDFs may not work properly.
chat.attachments.preview_only.title: Preview only
chat.attachments.preview_only.before: The selected model does not support vision. Only the extracted
chat.attachments.preview_only.after: will be sent to the model.
chat.attachments.pdf.no_file: No PDF file available for conversion
chat.attachments.audio.unsupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
chat.attachments.preview_unavailable: Preview not available for this file type
chat.sidebar.delete.title: Delete Conversation
chat.sidebar.delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all messages in this conversation.
chat.sidebar.edit.title: Edit Conversation Name
chat.settings.field.paste_long_text_to_f: Paste long text to file length
chat.settings.field.copy_text_attachment: Copy text attachments as plain text
chat.settings.field.ask_for_title_confir: Ask for confirmation before changing conversation title
chat.settings.saved_notice: Settings are saved in browser's localStorage
chat.settings.error.invalid_custom_json: Invalid JSON in custom parameters. Please check the format and try again.
chat.settings.error.invalid_numeric: Invalid numeric value for {field}. Please enter a valid number.
chat.settings.footer.reset_dialog.title: Reset Settings to Default
chat.settings.footer.reset_dialog.descri: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This will reset all parameters to the values provided by the server's /props endpoint and remove all your custom configurations.
chat.settings.import_export.export.title: Export Conversations
chat.settings.import_export.export.descr: Download all your conversations as a JSON file. This includes all messages, attachments, and conversation history.
chat.settings.import_export.import.title: Import Conversations
chat.settings.import_export.import.descr: Import one or more conversations from a previously exported JSON file. This will merge with your existing conversations.
chat.settings.import_export.delete.title: Delete All Conversations
chat.settings.import_export.delete.descr: Permanently delete all conversations and their messages. This action cannot be undone. Consider exporting your conversations first if you want to keep a backup.
chat.settings.import_export.delete.dialo: Are you sure you want to delete all conversations? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all your conversations and messages.
chat.settings.import_export.import.inval: Invalid file format: expected array of conversations or single conversation object
chat.settings.import_export.import.faile: Failed to import conversations. Please check the file format.
